name: Blood at the Disco
description:
A small game made for the GitHub Game Off Jam 2017, made in about ~2-3 week ( what I could and did realistically put into this project.)

Blood at the Disco is a basic turn based game where you take control of areas by completing mini-games while 3 AIs try to do the same.

Controls: ────────────────────────────────────────

Simple clicking around for most things.

A,S,W, D or Arrows to move the camera in the city.

Other: ────────────────────────────────────────

Win by having: 

+ 2000+ Money or 2000+ Success or 8 Fame.

────────────────────────────────────────

Fight:

+ Punch (Damage)

+ Charge (Buff)

+ Sucker-Punch (Debuff, Minor Heal & Damage)

+ Kick (Damage)

────────────────────────────────────────

Chance:  Blackjack-lite

+ Get 21 points.

+ Reach a final score higher than your opponent.

+ If both player stand, then the highest wins.

(Max of 5 cards, then you Stand)

────────────────────────────────────────

Dance:

+ Click on good moves to gain points.

Issues: ────────────────────────────────────────

Since I’ve rushed a bit to wrap this up quickly, you will notice a lot of unpolished things such as players not having proper in game representation beside their Avatars. Also, the Aces in the ‘ Blackjack-lite’ can sometime not count for 11 so keep that in mind (damn AI cheating!).

Credits: ────────────────────────────────────────

- Mart
